data.text: @Snow1nApril @waltham_s There are many people who have lost their jobs due to mandates.  Doctors/nurses/teachers/state police/firefighters/cops/state workers.  Many mandates have been lifted, Boston Public Schools is still masking the children.  science is pretty clear the vaccine works for the Alpha.

@waltham_s Studies on “vaccine hesitancy” tell us the BIPOC community make up a large percentage of those who remain unvaccinated.  Given their extensive history of being victims of medical racism in this country (including participation in experimental trials without informed consent)

@waltham_s People on the streets .need to be educated on theses communists self inflicted gas & oil prices food inflation.the green deal cult.Wu copying China free bus or ride a https://t.co/bHk0HlGwp0 won’t be able to afford the electric car.these will be only for the elite’s.

@waltham_s @BostonFRU Fight like hell. Thousands have you backs .life long Boston resident her.  I don’t appreciate outsiders like Wu and Pressley.coming into Boston disrespecting BCW or the BFD  Wu pulled some dirty business .Wu never to be trusted again.she’s a snake .

@BostonFRU @waltham_s U do not represent all Bostonians & u gave interviews just a couple of months ago that all u wanted was the option to test instead. I maintain this is attention-seeking behavior w/a bunch of “oppressed” & unemployed/living off the govt cast of characters. Lost all credibility.
@BostonFRU We disagree with you but we appreciate that you posted this relevant explanation instead of attacking the people who were asking.

@waltham_s Hi @waltham_s we are a diverse group of ppl tht seek medical freedom&right to work w/o forced medical intervention.While restrictions are being lifted the framework tht allowed the violations of rights to happen is still in place.We represent all Bostonians so we March everywhere
